EmailTemplate.name: PWS_Website_Dev Resurrection Campaign_2014.Resurrection-Survey Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Please share your experience with Pivotal Web Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Pivotal Web Services customer,
We would love your input! Our goal is for you to feel powerful thanks to the speed and simplicity PWS brings to deploying and running applications.
By answering 3 simple questions <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/pws-feedback> you can help us achieve this goal and improve the service for you and other developers. TAKE SURVEY <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/pws-feedback> You can always reach us at support@run.pivotal.io <mailto:support@run.pivotal.io> with feedback or questions. We look forward to hearing from you. cf push, Pivotal Web Services Team
